# Sample Project

This is a sample project for testing mise commands.

<!--Q:begin id=intro tags=readme,introduction v=1-->

## Introduction

This project demonstrates the anchor system and various mise features.
It includes sample code and documentation with embedded anchors.

<!--Q:end id=intro-->

## Features

<!--Q:begin id=features tags=readme,features v=1-->

- File scanning
- Anchor management
- Code search integration
<!--Q:end id=features-->

## Usage

See the main mise documentation for usage instructions.
